statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND click_through_rate >= 2.5;
DELETE FROM Clicks WHERE click_timestamp < '2021-09-01' AND product_clicked = 'Shoes';
DELETE FROM conversions WHERE conversion_value < 100.00 AND conversion_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM emails WHERE send_date < '2022-01-01' AND email_id IN (SELECT email_id FROM clicks WHERE link_clicked LIKE '%special%');
DELETE FROM CampaignSubscribers WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND subscriber_id = 10;
DELETE FROM CampaignSubscribers WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND subscriber_id = 10;
